article.headline: Creighton 71, Southern U. 60
article.story: OMAHA, Neb. -- Booker Woodfox scored 17 points Monday to lead Creighton past Southern University 71-60. The senior guard canned three consecutive threes late in the second half to help the Bluejays improve to 8-2 on the season. Woodfox is shooting 53 percent from 3-point range through 10 games this season. Creighton scored 12 of the game's first 13 points and never trailed while improving to 7-0 at home. Woodfox's one-minute barrage of 3-pointers gave the Bluejays an insurmountable 15-point cushion. Cavel Witter, P'Allen Stinnett and Justin Carter also scored in double figures for the Jays. Southern got 16 points from Chris Davis and 15 from Jazz Williams.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
